code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import'./Todo.css';import{List,ListItemText,ListItem,ListItemAvatar,Button}from'@material-ui/core';import db from"./firebase";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Todo(props){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(List,{className:"todo_list",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(ListItem,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListItemAvatar,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListItemText,{primary:props.todo.todo,secondary:"Tomorrow \u23F0"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:function onClick(event){return db.collection('todos').doc(props.todo.id).delete();},children:"\u274C Delete Me!!!"})]});}export default Todo;
